source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video captures a quiet residential street with traditional Japanese houses, neatly trimmed trees, and a clear blue sky. Power lines and a distant red tower are visible, adding to the urban landscape. The scene is calm and picturesque.

source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The distant red tower mentioned in the video is likely a red and white high-voltage power line pylon.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The distant red tower mentioned in the video is likely a red and white high-voltage power line pylon.

Power lines and a distant red and white high-voltage power line pylon are visible, adding to the urban landscape. The scene is calm and picturesque.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides quickly down a busy city avenue lined with tall glass skyscrapers. Several pedestrians cross the street as the cyclists weave between them, and a city bus pulls up to a stop in the background. The cyclists continue pedaling past a large fountain in the center of the intersection.
